item.title: requiem
item.description: Here are some cool links. first off check out this. Be sure and read the description. heh. then check out this. and finally check out this - http://www.select-media.com/version/. From the page: Version>02 is an exploration of our digital commons and an opportunity to meet those who tend to its gardens, fences, and pathways. It is an investigation into maintaining, expanding and designing the commons, while ensuring the continuation of shared resources and information in all facets of communications.
